author: Julian Mann
description:
How the NHS apparatchiks must hate the media for shining a light on their mistreatment of Christian nurse Jennifer Melle, who bravely stood up to their trans dogma, says Julian Mann.

The post How These NHS Apparatchiks Must Hate the Media for Shining a Light on Their Mistreatment of Christian Nurse Jennifer Melle Who Stood Up to Their Trans Dogma appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: How These NHS Apparatchiks Must Hate the Media for Shining a Light on Their Mistreatment of Christian Nurse Jennifer Melle Who Stood Up to Their Trans Dogma

author: Will Jones
description:
The US has ended its recommendation of Covid vaccine boosters for most Americans. FDA Commissioner Martin Makary and FDA vaccine chief Vinay Prasad announced the change for healthy under-65s today in the NEJM.

The post US Ends Recommendation of Covid Vaccine Boosters for Most Americans appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: US Ends Recommendation of Covid Vaccine Boosters for Most Americans

author: Will Jones
description:
The Conservative Party has sunk to its lowest ever poll rating, after a YouGov poll carried out on Sunday and Monday found the Tories are now in fourth place on just 16%. Reform is flying on 29% ahead of Labour on 22%.

The post Tories Sink to Lowest Ever Poll Rating appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Tories Sink to Lowest Ever Poll Rating

author: Will Jones
description:
Lucy Connolly, who was jailed for 31 months for a tweet posted in the wake of the Southport murders, has failed in her attempt to be released early after the Court of Appeal refused to reduce her sentence.

The post Lucy Connolly Loses Appeal for Early Release From 31-Month Sentence for Southport Tweet appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Lucy Connolly Loses Appeal for Early Release From 31-Month Sentence for Southport Tweet

author: Will Jones
description:
Tommy Robinson is due to be released from prison within days after his 18-month sentence for the civil offence of contempt of court was reduced by four months at the High Court after he showed a "change in attitude".

The post Tommy Robinson to be Released From Prison After High Court Reduces 18-Month Sentence for Contempt of Court appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Tommy Robinson to be Released From Prison After High Court Reduces 18-Month Sentence for Contempt of Court

author: Chris Morrison
description:
EXCLUSIVE: Almost all 'extreme' temperature highs in the UK are now being recorded at junk sites with error margins of 2-5°C. The fact these are counted as valid is a massive scientific scandal, says Chris Morrison.

The post EXCLUSIVE: Almost All ‘Extreme’ Temperature Highs in UK Now Being Recorded at Junk Sites with Massive Possible Errors appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: EXCLUSIVE: Almost All ‘Extreme’ Temperature Highs in UK Now Being Recorded at Junk Sites with Massive Possible Errors

author: Ben Pile
description:
Last month saw a huge increase in energy consumers' direct debit failures. Yet who are all these green organisations now fretting about fuel poverty? The very same pushing the Net Zero agenda, says Ben Pile.

The post Now the Green Blob Starts Fretting About ‘Fuel Poverty’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Now the Green Blob Starts Fretting About ‘Fuel Poverty’

author: Richard Eldred
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
